Package org.jlab.coda.hipo

Class Reader.RecordPosition

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.coda.hipo.Reader.RecordPosition
Enclosing class:
Reader
public static class Reader.RecordPosition extends Object
Internal class to keep track of the records in the file/buffer. Each entry keeps record position in the file/buffer, length of the record and number of entries contained.
